job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Do you have an interest in sports betting? This is the role for you. This company is a sports betting exchange that prides themselves on bringing innovation, transparency, liquidity, and security to the sports betting industry to benefit their customers.
Right now, they are looking for an experienced Site Reliability Engineer to join their operations and infrastructure team. This is a combination of DevOps, cloud engineering, and system operations. You should be someone who is experienced in AWS, programming and/or scripting in Python or Bash, infrastructure as code, Docker and Kubernetes, and monitoring.
This is a full-time, fully remote role offering up to $150k with great benefits like unlimited PTO.
Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.
Alyssa Valles
